headline: Synchrony and The Toro Company Launch New Credit Card for Financing Lawn Equipment
summary: Synchrony (NYSE: SYF), a leading consumer financing company, and The Toro Company, a leading global provider of solutions for the outdoor environment, today announced the launch of The Toro Company credit card program, issued by Synchrony. The new program provides Toro, Exmark, Spartan and Z Turf Equipment dealers with innovative financial solutions that help strengthen customer relationships, drive sales and grow their business.
